screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 3), size = (480, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 2 is the Menu Titel MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 29), size = (480, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 3 is the Description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (500, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Enigma", 18),gFont("Enigma", 13)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10,1),size = (48,48),png = 0),# index 0 is the isMounted pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110,3),size = (250,25),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 1 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (360,5),size = (110,17),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 2),# index 2 is the IPdescription MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110,29),size = (250,17),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# index 3 is the DIRdescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (470,9),size = (48,48),png = 4),# index 4 is the activepng pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (505,1),size = (48,48),png = 5),# index 4 is the mounttype pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20),gFont("Regular",14)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 0), size = (60, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 0), size = (120, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (240, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 4), size = (15, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 0), size = (60, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 0), size = (120, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (240, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 4), size = (15, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 25 }
